fields.title: Widescreen Image
fields.name: widescreen
fields.description:
Upload a widescreen image to accompany the content. 
Note: The image should have a 16:9 aspect ratio (e.g., 4096 x 2304)

fields.title: Square Image
fields.name: square
fields.description:
Upload a square image to accompany the content. 
Note: The image should have a 1:1 aspect ratio (e.g., 2048 x 2048).

fields.title: Sticker Image
fields.name: sticker
fields.description:
Upload a sticker image to accompany the content. 
Note: The image should have a 1:1 aspect ratio (e.g., 256 x 256) with a transparent background.

fields.title: Video
fields.name: video
fields.description:
Attach a video file if applicable. Supported formats: MP4. 
Note: The video should have a 16:9 aspect ratio (e.g., 1080 x 1920).
